name: Tangled Vines: Frostnight Scion
desc:
An elegant elemental life form that possesses immense elemental affinity. The long years have exposed it to high concentrations of Dendro, resulting in its present form.
This entity has a marvelous resonance with the plant life of the groves. Some say that one of the Moonchanters once made a contract with the wooded lands with their help, thus becoming a friend and companion to all life on this land.
In still-extant prayers of the far north, it was born from the Frost Moon's blessings, symbolizing the pure source and the first radiance. Perhaps this is why it finds the tainting of its pale purity with the seven colors of heavenly light unbearable, thus rejecting all life that draws too close.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Frostnight's Glimmer
dropMaterial.desc:
A fragment taken from the horned crown of a defeated Frostnight Scion.
Legend has it that in the distant past, these noble creatures were servants to the Golden City, their eyes reflecting the holiest and brightest light of heaven. That light has long since been extinguished, but these scions that lost their master still roam beneath the frosty moon, keeping an oath that no one now remembers.

dropMaterial.name: Frostnight's Glow
dropMaterial.desc:
A chunk taken from the horned crown of a defeated Frostnight Scion.
In the oldest sagas of the Frostmoon Scions, the glow of these noble creatures was described as the "unsullied mercy of the divine emissary" by the philosophers of the far north. Though this mercy could not prevent the fall of the Golden City or save her descendants from exile, the same glow still courses through their horned crowns, waiting for a dream that may never return.

dropMaterial.name: Frostnight's Glory
dropMaterial.desc:
A bone plate taken from the horned crown of a defeated Frostnight Scion.
A warmth as glossy as moonlight envelopes it, radiating strongly even in the dead of winter nights. In a sense, just like the Frostmoon Scions, this is the last thing these noble creatures stand by. The master they once served has been reduced to dust, yet their dreams still glow with golden splendor.

customize.text: An elemental lifeform that has gained an extremely high elemental affinity over long years of exposure to the moonlight. In battle, Frostnight Scions can convert themselves to enter a Gloomveiled state. While in this state, Frostnight Scions become more powerful. <color=#ffe14b>Deal DMG to Frostnight Scions using elemental attacks of the same elemental type as them or by using Lunar Reactions</color> to illuminate them and force them to leave their Gloomveiled state.
